name: Wordz Chase 3000
description:
EVERY NIGHT WORDZ SWARM

UNITE!

FIGHT WORDZ!

ENTER GUESS; COLOR CLUES:

AMBER CLOSE, GREEN RIGHT.

ENJOY DAILY. AGAIN ABIDE.

Features

Over 3000 words!

Letter-tron automatically tracks your guesses.

Unique DAY-LOK technology provides the optimal one-a-day experience.

Over 10 years of gameplay!

Available for 48K/128K Spectrum/Spectrum+.

I'm not really expecting anyone to pay, but currently the revenue split is 50/50 between itch and myself. I'll donate anything i get that is more than GBP 10.
